Text:
function RIR_EP05_09()
    -- .承-3【2月第2週】「姿を見せた悪意」
    SaveData.Title = "姿を見せた悪意"

    -- //BG：病室
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG009aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)

PLAY_BGM("BGM03.wav")

    MSG([[ A week passed. I started walking practice with crutches in my hospital room outside of rehabilitation hours. ]])

    -- //CI：酸素マシーンに入るゆるエリカ 136
    LAYER_LOAD(60,"CI136a")
    LAYER_POSITION(60,0,-200)
    LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(60,0,0,500,Ease.OutSine)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,false)

    MSG([[ Thanks to a device called the super vibration machine, which Lira-san borrowed through Uran-san's connections to speed up healing, my broken bone seemed to be healing quickly. ]])

    MSG([[ My doctor told me to stay still outside of rehab time, but I just couldn't listen to that advice. ]])

    MSG([[ I have to push myself a little and heal as fast as possible to return to the academy. ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN04aa")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_1134.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 (Lira-san said the Princess Election PR activities are going well too) ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN04ea")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_1135.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 (I can't just sit still either. I have to recover quickly and fight alongside everyone!) ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

STOP_BGM(1000)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",0,false)
    LAYER_MOVE_ALPHA(60,0,500,Ease.InSine)
    LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(60,0,-200,500,Ease.InSine)
    WAIT(500)
    LAYER_LOAD(60,"")

PLAY_VOICE("nemesia_0091.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Nemesia】
 "You're working hard from the morning, huh~" ]])

    MSG([[ Without a sound, a flashy-looking woman entered the hospital room. ]])

PLAY_BGM("BGM05.wav")

    -- //BU：ネメシア（通常）
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_MEN01aa")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,200,0)
    LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(50,0,0,500,Ease.OutSine)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,true)

PLAY_VOICE("nemesia_0092.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Nemesia】
 "It's always beautiful to see a boy doing his best~<sprite="Emoji" name="star"> Well, I hate boys second only in the world, though." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN04ca")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_1136.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 "Himegami, Nemesia-san." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ Nemesia Himegami. She's the very person who tried to intimidate Lira-san and caused me this serious injury. ]])

    MSG([[ Why did she show up here? Not knowing her intent, I was on guard and ready. ]])

PLAY_VOICE("nemesia_0093.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Nemesia】
 "Oh~? Don't you have something you want to ask me~?" ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_MEN01qa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("nemesia_0094.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Nemesia】
 "Like... did you order someone to run me over?<sprite="Emoji" name="note"> Hahaha, hyahahyaha!" ]])

    MSG([[ Nemesia clapped her hands and laughed cheerfully. If my legs were healthy, I might have lunged at her. ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN04ba")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_1137.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 "What do you want? I'm busy with rehabilitation, so unless you have business, please leave." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

PLAY_VOICE("nemesia_0095.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Nemesia】
 "You're treating me coldly. Fine~<sprite="Emoji" name="note"> I'll treat you in the worst cold way imaginable now~<sprite="Emoji" name="star">" ]])

    MSG([[ No sooner had she said that than Nemesia kicked away my crutch. ]])

    MSG([[ Losing my support, I helplessly fell to the floor. ]])

    -- //SE：床に転がる音
PLAY_SE("SEc019.wav")
WAIT(500)

    MSG([[ Humiliation. As a martial artist, I could not tolerate such treatment. ]])

    MSG([[ But the real surprise attack awaited ahead. ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_MEN01aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("nemesia_0096.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Nemesia】
 "I'll say it straight. Withdraw from the Princess Election." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN04ca")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_1138.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 "...Huh?" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ What is she saying? And why is she saying this to me openly, not to Erika? ]])

    MSG([[ Nemesia answered the two questions that came to mind. ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_MEN01aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("nemesia_0097.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Nemesia】
 "We've known from the start you’re infiltrating by crossdressing~<sprite="Emoji" name="star"> We could easily force you to quit for crossdressing anytime." ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_MEN01aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("nemesia_0098.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Nemesia】
 "So... do you know why we've let you swim free so far? There are two reasons." ]])

    MSG([[ She moved her face closer to mine and asked. ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_MEN01qa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("nemesia_0099.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Nemesia】
 "First, because you look exactly like the detestable Marika Ikusa<sprite="Emoji" name="star"> And second, because you're incredibly useful for fulfilling my ambitions." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("nemesia_0100_1.0.1.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Nemesia】
 "You understand I hold your fate in my hands, right? If you don’t want your gender revealed, obey my orders." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN04ba")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_1139.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 "—No." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_MEN01ba")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("nemesia_0101.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Nemesia】
 "...Huh?" ]])

    MSG([[ Nemesia's expression twisted. ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN04ba")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_1140.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 "Since I'm dealing with people who'd run others over with cars, I was prepared to have my gender revealed." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("minato_1141.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 "I won't cause trouble for the conservatives just for me. I firmly reject your demands." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_MEN01aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("nemesia_0102.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Nemesia】
 "...You're frustrating me. As expected of Marika Ikusa’s brother." ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_MEN01qa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("nemesia_0103.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Nemesia】
 "But~? What about your friends? Are they ready to have their identities revealed too?<sprite="Emoji" name="note">" ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN04ca")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_1142.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 "What do you mean?" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ Nemesia pulled a smartphone from her pocket. On the screen was an image of Lira-san and me on a date, both without masks. ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_MEN01qa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("nemesia_0104.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Nemesia】
 "What would happen if everyone found out the charismatic JK’s true face is so plain and that she has a boyfriend~<sprite="Emoji" name="star"> Just imagining it gives me chills, doesn’t it?" ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN04ga")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_1143.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 "L-Lira-san has nothing to do with this! Why target Lira-san—" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_MEN01ba")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("nemesia_0105.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Nemesia】
 "She’s not innocent. She forgot the favor of me discovering her talent and dared to oppose me. That alone deserves death." ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_MEN01qa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("nemesia_0106.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Nemesia】
 "Ah, 'death' meaning socially, you see<sprite="Emoji" name="star"> Hehehe." ]])

    MSG([[ My heartbeat quickened. I hadn’t expected her to still target Lira-san even in this situation. ]])

    MSG([[ Surely, the woman before me would reveal her true nature. ]])

    MSG([[ She wouldn't rest until she found and crushed every insect that bit her, no matter how small. ]])

    MSG([[ Her personality, unpleasant as it was, came through loud and clear. ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_MEN01ba")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("nemesia_0107.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Nemesia】
 "I don’t want to crush young talent. I wouldn’t have touched you physically if you hadn’t interfered this time.<sprite="Emoji" name="star">" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("nemesia_0108.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Nemesia】
 "Lira Hoozuki alone can’t rival Hermes. But now, I can at least save my beloved Lira-chan." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("nemesia_0109.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Nemesia】
 "Give up and know your place, or struggle and lose even more precious things. Now, choose." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN04da")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_1144.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 "I-I..." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ I tried to stand but still couldn't and kneeled down. ]])

    MSG([[ I lacked the willpower to force myself up. I wanted nothing more than to just fall forward as I was. ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN04da")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_1145.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 "I will... obey you. I will withdraw from the Princess Election. So, please... please don’t harm Lira-san." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_MEN01qa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("nemesia_0110.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Nemesia】
 "That’s more like it, you dummy~<sprite="Emoji" name="star">" ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")

    -- //BG：黒バック
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG000aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)

PLAY_VOICE("nemesia_0111.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Nemesia】
 "Hyahaha... Hya---ha ha ha ha!" ]])

    MSG([[ As Nemesia’s loud laughter echoed, I collapsed to the floor as I was. ]])

    -- 　　　　◆
STOP_BGM(1000)
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG000aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 0)
    WAIT_INPUT(1000)

    ScenarioManager.Next("RIR_EP05_10")
end
